trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data supplied by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il tipo di dati forniti dal <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a dataflow block that is a source of data.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un blocco del flusso di dati che è un'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being consumed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> del messaggio utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> consuming the message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> che consuma il messaggio.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully consumed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il messaggio è stato consumato con esito positivo, <see langword="false" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to accept and consume a T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader previously offered by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da un elemento <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> collegato per accettare e consumare un oggetto T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader offerto in precedenza da <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the consumed message.
trans-unit.target: Valore del messaggio utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: This may correspond to a different <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> instance than was previously reserved and passed as the <paramref name="messageHeader" /> to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore può corrispondere a un'istanza diversa di <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> in precedenza riservata e passata come <paramref name="messageHeader" /> a <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />.

trans-unit.source: The consuming <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> must use the returned value instead of the value passed as <paramref name="messageValue" /> through <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1.OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> che usa le risorse deve utilizzare il valore restituito al posto del valore passato come <paramref name="messageValue" /> con <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1.OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: If the message requested is not available, the return value will be null.
trans-unit.target: Se il messaggio richiesto non è disponibile, il valore restituito sarà Null.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to consume <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: Solo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> istanze collegata a questo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> istanza può utilizzare <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>, e deve essere utilizzata solo per <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> istanze precedentemente offerto da questa origine alla destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The messageHeader is not valid.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto messageHeader non è valido.

trans-unit.source: The target is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to which to connect this source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> a cui connettere questa origine.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> instance that configures the link.
trans-unit.target: Istanza <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> che configura il collegamento.

trans-unit.source: Links the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Collega l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: An IDisposable that, upon calling Dispose, will unlink the source from the target.
trans-unit.target: IDisposable, che quando viene chiamato Dispose, scollegherà l'origine dalla destinazione.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic) or <paramref name="linkOptions" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> è Null (Nothing in Visual Basic) o <paramref name="linkOptions" /> è Null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the reserved message being released.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> del messaggio prenotato riservato che viene rilasciato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> releasing the message it previously reserved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> che genera il messaggio prenotato in precedenza.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to release a previously reserved <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> collegato per rilasciare un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> precedentemente riservato da questo <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use `ReleaseReservation`, and it must only be used to release <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously and successfully reserved by the target.
trans-unit.target: Solo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> istanze collegata a questo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> istanza può utilizzare `ReleaseReservation`, e deve essere utilizzato solo per rilasciare <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> istanze in precedenza e correttamente riservate dalla destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <paramref name="messageHeader" /> non è valido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <paramref name="target" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> did not have the message reserved.
trans-unit.target: Il <paramref name="target" /> non dispone del messaggio riservato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being reserved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> del messaggio prenotato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> reserving the message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> che riserva il messaggio.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to reserve a previously offered <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> collegato per conservare un <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> precedentemente offerto da questo <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully reserved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il messaggio è stato riservato, <see langword="false" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to reserve <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: Solo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> istanze collegata a questo <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> istanza può utilizzare <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>, e deve essere utilizzato solo da riservare <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> istanze precedentemente offerto da questa origine alla destinazione.

trans-unit.source: If `true` is returned, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> must subsequently call either <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A> for this message.
trans-unit.target: Se `true` viene restituito, il <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> successivamente necessario chiamare <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A> o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A> per questo messaggio.

trans-unit.source: Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, può comportare l'origine non sarà in grado di propagare a questo o da altre destinazioni ulteriori messaggi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> non deve essere chiamato quando la destinazione è presente alcun blocco interno.

trans-unit.source: Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo verrà violare la gerarchia di blocchi necessaria per evitare deadlock in una rete del flusso di dati.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <paramref name="messageHeader" /> non è valido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <paramref name="target" /> è <see langword="null" />.
